column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The food is delicious. For the most bang for your buck
column2: I'd suggest to order the pinxos combos. Patatas bravas are my absolute favorite! The atmosphere is a bit sexy
column3: so if you're like me and just rolling by after a rough day at work
column4: you may feel underdressed. It's okay
column5: though. All customers are treated equally :) more detailed review on my blog
